languages.text: "Великий дух машины, идентифицирующий себя как Ноль-Халиф, может стать ценным союзником, заменив собой навигаторов из плоти. Нам надлежит установить с этим святым существом контакт, сие будет угодно Омниссии. Изгнание Движущей силы из техножрецов, дерзнувших нарушить покой Ноль-Халифа, свидетельствует о могуществе его цифрового гласа. Я владею знаниями, что позволят создать посредника для коммуникации с грозным духом машины, который ослабит бремя его откровений на неподготовленные умы".

traits.locale_text: "Великий дух машины, идентифицирующий себя как Ноль-Халиф, может стать ценным союзником, заменив собой навигаторов из плоти. Нам надлежит установить с этим святым существом контакт, сие будет угодно Омниссии. Изгнание Движущей силы из техножрецов, дерзнувших нарушить покой Ноль-Халифа, свидетельствует о могуществе его цифрового гласа. Я владею знаниями, что позволят создать посредника для коммуникации с грозным духом машины, который ослабит бремя его откровений на неподготовленные умы".

languages.text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears potential as a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with this holy entity, for to do so is to honour the Omnissiah's tenets. That the Tech-Priests who had the audacity to disturb Null Caliph were deprived of their Motive Force is a testament to the might of its data-voice. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator that could interface with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."
languages.original_text: "Великий дух машины, идентифицирующий себя как Ноль-Халиф, может стать ценным союзником, заменив собой навигаторов из плоти. Нам надлежит установить с этим святым существом контакт, сие будет угодно Омниссии. Изгнание Движущей силы из техножрецов, дерзнувших нарушить покой Ноль-Халифа, свидетельствует о могуществе его цифрового гласа. traits.locale_text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears the potential of a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with it. That the Tech-Priests who had the audacity to disturb Null Caliph were deprived of their Motive Force is a testament to the might of its data-voice. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator who would communicate with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."

"The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph wishes to continue its reflections in solitude. We should humbly do as it commands. I hereby request that a perimeter around the data-engine is erected and volunteer to oversee its construction."

"The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears the potential of a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator who would communicate with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."

languages.text: “这个伟大的机魂将自己命名为虚无哈里发，它很有潜力成为有价值的盟友，可以取代由脆弱肉体构成的导航者。我们必须与这个神圣的实体接触，这样做是为了崇敬欧姆尼塞亚的信条。那些胆敢扰乱虚无哈里发的技术神甫被剥夺了他们的源力，这证明了它的数据之声拥有强大的力量。根据我掌握的知识，我可以制造出一台调停器，用来与这个可怕的机魂交流，减轻它的启示对毫无准备之人带来的负担。”
languages.original_text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears potential as a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with this holy entity, for to do so is to honour the Omnissiah's tenets. That the Tech-Priests who had the audacity to disturb Null Caliph were deprived of their Motive Force is a testament to the might of its data-voice. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator that could interface with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."

traits.locale_text: “这个伟大的机魂将自己命名为虚无哈里发，它很有潜力成为有价值的盟友，可以取代由脆弱肉体构成的导航者。我们必须与这个神圣的实体接触，这样做是为了崇敬欧姆尼塞亚的信条。那些胆敢扰乱虚无哈里发的技术祭司被剥夺了他们的原初动力，这证明了它的数据之声拥有强大的力量。根据我掌握的知识，我可以制造出一台调停器，用来与这个可怕的机魂交流，减轻它的启示对毫无准备之人带来的负担。”

languages.text: «El gran espíritu máquina que se identifica a sí mismo como Null Caliph tiene potencial como valioso aliado, uno que podría reemplazar la necesidad de navegantes de carne y hueso. Debemos ponernos en contacto con esta entidad sagrada, porque hacerlo es honrar los principios del Omnissiah. El hecho de que los tecnosacerdotes que tuvieron la osadía de molestar al Null Caliph fueran privados de su Fuerza Motriz es un testimonio del poder de su voz de datos. Poseo los conocimientos para crear un mediador que pueda interactuar con el temible espíritu máquina y aliviar la carga de sus revelaciones en las mentes desprevenidas».
languages.original_text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears potential as a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with this holy entity, for to do so is to honour the Omnissiah's tenets. That the Tech-Priests who had the audacity to disturb Null Caliph were deprived of their Motive Force is a testament to the might of its data-voice. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator that could interface with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."

traits.locale_text: «El gran espíritu máquina que se identifica a sí mismo como Null Caliph tiene potencial como valioso aliado, uno que podría reemplazar la necesidad de navegantes de carne y hueso. Debemos ponernos en contacto con esta entidad sagrada, porque hacerlo es honrar los principios del Omnissiah. El hecho de que los tecnosacerdotes que tuvieron la osadía de molestar al Null Caliph fueran privados de su Fuerza Motriz es un testimonio del poder de su voz de datos. Poseo los conocimientos para crear un mediador que pueda interactuar con el temible espíritu máquina y aliviar la carga de sus revelaciones en las mentes desprevenidas».

languages.text: 「ヌル・カリフを名乗る偉大な機械精神は、貴重な味方となる可能性を秘めている。過ちを犯しがちな肉体で構成される航宙士の需要の代わりになるかもしれない。私たちはこの聖なる実体と接触しなければならないのだ。そうすることで、万機神の信条を尊重することになる。大胆にもヌル・カリフの邪魔をした技術司祭が原動力を奪われたということは、そのデータ・ボイスの威力を証明している。私なら、その恐るべき機械精霊と交信し、やつの準備ができていない心の露呈による負担を和らげることができる調停者を生み出すための知識を有している」
languages.original_text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears potential as a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with this holy entity, for to do so is to honour the Omnissiah's tenets. That the Tech-Priests who had the audacity to disturb Null Caliph were deprived of their Motive Force is a testament to the might of its data-voice. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator that could interface with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."

traits.locale_text: 「ヌル・カリフを名乗る偉大な機械精神は、貴重な味方となる可能性を秘めている。過ちを犯しがちな肉体で構成される航宙士の需要の代わりになるかもしれない。私たちはこの聖なる実体と接触しなければならないのだ。そうすることで、万機神の信条を尊重することになる。大胆にもヌル・カリフの邪魔をした技術司祭が原動力を奪われたということは、そのデータ・ボイスの威力を証明している。私なら、その恐るべき機械精霊と交信し、やつの準備ができていない心の露呈による負担を和らげることができる調停者を生み出すための知識を有している」

languages.text: « L'éminent esprit de la machine qui se fait appeler Null Caliph ferait un allié précieux, qui pourrait remplacer les faillibles navigateurs faits de chair. Nous devons entrer en contact avec cette entité sacrée, conformément aux préceptes de l'Omnimessie. Le fait que les technoprêtres qui ont eu l'audace de l'importuner aient été dépossédés de leur Force Motrice témoigne de la puissance de sa voix numérique. Je suis en mesure de créer un médiator pouvant faire office d'interface avec la redoutable entité mécanique, et ainsi alléger le fardeau de ses révélations sur les esprits mal préparés. »
languages.original_text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears potential as a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with this holy entity, for to do so is to honour the Omnissiah's tenets. That the Tech-Priests who had the audacity to disturb Null Caliph were deprived of their Motive Force is a testament to the might of its data-voice. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator that could interface with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."

traits.locale_text: « L'éminent esprit de la machine qui se fait appeler Null Caliph ferait un allié précieux, qui pourrait remplacer les faillibles navigateurs faits de chair. Nous devons entrer en contact avec cette entité sacrée, conformément aux préceptes de l'Omnimessie. Le fait que les technoprêtres qui ont eu l'audace de l'importuner aient été dépossédés de leur Force Motrice témoigne de la puissance de sa voix numérique. Je suis en mesure de créer un médiator pouvant faire office d'interface avec la redoutable entité mécanique, et ainsi alléger le fardeau de ses révélations sur les esprits mal préparés. »

languages.text: "Der große Maschinengeist, der sich als Null Caliph identifiziert, hat das Potenzial zu einem wertvollen Verbündeten. Einem, der den Bedarf an Navigatoren aus fehleranfälligem Fleisch ersetzen könnte. Wir müssen Kontakt mit diesem heiligen Wesen aufnehmen, denn dadurch ehren wir die Grundsätze des Omnissiah. Dass den Techpriestern, die Null Caliph so dreist gestört haben, ihre Antriebskraft entzogen wurde, ist ein Beleg für die Macht seiner Datenstimme. Ich besitze das Wissen, wie man einen Mediator herstellen kann, der als Schnittstelle zu dem furchterregenden Maschinengeist dienen kann. Um zu verhindern, dass seine Offenbarungen einen unvorbereiteten Verstand überfordern."
languages.original_text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears potential as a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with this holy entity, for to do so is to honour the Omnissiah's tenets. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator that could interface with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."

Um zu verhindern, dass seine Offenbarungen einen unvorbereiteten Verstand überfordern."

languages.text: "Kendini Hiçlik Halifesi olarak tanımlayan ulu makine ruhu, kıymetli bir müttefik olma potansiyelini taşımakta. Fâni Rotacılara duyduğumuz ihtiyacı bir başına karşılayabilir. Bu mukaddes varlıkla iletişim kurmalıyız. Hermesih'in ilkelerini ancak böyle yerine getirebiliriz. Hiçlik Halifesi'ni rahatsız etme cüretini gösteren Tekno Rahiplerin Devinim Güçlerinden mahrum bırakılması, veri sesinin haşmetini kanıtlar nitelikte. Bu müthiş makine ruhuyla bağlantı kurup vahiylerinin ihtiyatsız akıllarda gösterdiği etkiyi hafifletmeyi sağlayacak bir ara bulucunun üretilmesi için gerekli irfana sahibim."
languages.original_text: "The great machine spirit that identifies itself as Null Caliph bears potential as a valuable ally, one that could replace the need for Navigators comprised of fallible flesh. We must make contact with this holy entity, for to do so is to honour the Omnissiah's tenets. That the Tech-Priests who had the audacity to disturb Null Caliph were deprived of their Motive Force is a testament to the might of its data-voice. I hold the knowledge to create a mediator that could interface with the fearsome machine spirit and ease the burden of its revelations on unprepared minds."
